text.div:
Advanced Beneficiary Notice Code

CodeDescriptionDeutsch (German)CommentVersion
1 Service is subject to medical necessity proceduresZuzahlung muss abgeklärt werdenadded v2.3.1
2 Patient has been informed of responsibility, and agrees to pay for serviceadded v2.3.1
3 Patient has been informed of responsibility, and asks that the payer be billedPatient fragt nach Rechnungadded v2.3.1
4 Advanced Beneficiary Notice has not been signedZustimmung zur Zuzahlung liegt nicht voradded v2.3.1

name: v2 Advanced Beneficiary Notice Code
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0339 ( Advanced Beneficiary Notice Code)
